actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB; Treasury Department.

official_title: A bill to amend section 474 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that small businesses with average annual gross receipts not in excess of $10,000,000 may elect to use one inventory pool.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase from $2,000,000 to $10,000,000 the average annual gross receipts for small businesses which elect to use one inventory pool for income tax accounting purposes.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 474 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that small businesses with average annual gross receipts not in excess of $10,000,000 may elect to use one inventory pool.
